fn.p: Citation Gutierrez B, Wise EL, Pullan ST, Logue CH, Bowden TA, Escalera-Zamudio M, Trueba G, Nunes MRT, Faria NR, Pybus OG. 2020. Evolutionary dynamics of Oropouche virus in South America. J Virol 94:e01127-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/JVI.01127-19.
